website_summaries.verdict: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Core Hi can be described in two words - simple and timeless. This vintage profile displays fuss-free design with lightweight and flexible materials apt for laid-back stunts.Although this pair doesn't provide cutthroat comfort and support, the brand opted to keep the classic elements untouched since this model was conceived. This silhouette is an excellent recommendation to buyers looking for a classic pair that never goes out of style. In fact, this shoe mysteriously looks even better years after years of being used.
pros: Majority of reviewers highly recommended the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Core Hi
This pair has a budget-friendly price point
Several users mentioned about the polished finishing of the All Star Core Hi from Converse
Some of the reviewers applauded the nice color scheme of this kick
Several times, the reviewers remarked that this is a nice addition to one's collection
Many online buyers shared that this pair looks exactly as expected
Suitable for everyday use, shared by a handful of reviewers
Few said that they could use this pair for almost any casual wear
They cited that this pair is easy to style
Some wearers mentioned about the stylish and timeless look of this sneaker
The Converse Chuck Taylor All Str Core Hi runs true to size
cons: Several users disclosed that the Chuck Taylor All Star Core Hi has poor arch support

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice
customer_reviews.text: Only worn them in the house for a few hours to make sure they fit. Brought them as my night shoes for my wedding when I can no longer walk in the heals
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: My fave trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Omg GORGEOUS High tops. Well chuffed. So nice looking in the Black Velvet and Rose Gold studding and detailing. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: KGee

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and so much warmer than your average canvas converse
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and so much warmer than your average canvas converse. Love these and wear them all the time. Fit perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: HFP

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great Converse. Look good and feel good. ..and were despatched and delivered promptly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: mazen

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than the picture. Brought for my daughter for Christmas and I just know she’s going to love them
customer_reviews.author: john wynne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have them in black and was practically living in then so white had to be purchased.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: giving away at the heels the sides cuming away bad quality not the real deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent shoe. Extremely comfortable right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: tim boorman

customer_reviews.title: Good value for leather converse
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew and they fitted absolutely perfectly, they look good and will last being leather better in bad weather too.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I like Converse footwear, so probably a biased review. They're always of good quality and comfortable. Delivered well within the promised schedule Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: William Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Get them! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful Shoes, it is more than what I expected! Very nice, stylish and can pretty much wear with anything. I bought them to replace my older, broken, material shoes and i could not be happier. When these wear down I will get them again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find anywhere and product exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: D. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: if you like converse then get these bad boys they are awesome and you will not be unimpressed with these they are a new level of converse.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this purchase. After wearing them twice they fit lit a glove. Would definitely reccomend for Converse fans.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy 808, Bristol, UK

customer_reviews.title: Leather Converse
customer_reviews.text: Combines the authenticity of the original canvas shoe with harder wearing, waterproofed leather uppers at a fantastic price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ART

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Adults' Ct as Hi Leather Chocolate Trainers
product_meta.description: Features: Leather vulcanised rubber sole lacing with metal eyelets high cut logo patch on the side hard-wearing material Material: Sole: 100% plastic material Lining: 100% Polyester Outer Shell: 100% Leather###choco/beige
feature_bullets: Classic look. Leather top and rubber sole.
Converse chuck taylors are known to run one size big. (Order one size smaller than other shoe brands)
We reccommend that if you have never worn converse shoes before, to try some on before selecting your size.
